mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ASSTEMPLATE(NAME, DESCRIPTION, METHODOLOGY, PHASE, CREATION_TIME, ASSET_ID, THREAT_ID, VULNERABILITY_ID, SAFEGUARD_ID, RISKMODEL_ID, SESTOBJ_ID) VALUES (#{name}, #{description}, #{methodology},#{phase}, NOW(), #{assetId}, #{threatId}, #{vulnerabilityId}, #{safeguardId}, #{riskModelId}, #{sestobjId})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ASSPROFILE_TEMPLATE WHERE PROFILE_ID = #{profileId} AND TEMPLATE_ID = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE ASSTEMPLATE SET NAME = #{name}, DESCRIPTION = #{description}, METHODOLOGY = #{methodology}, PHASE = #{phase}, ASSET_ID = #{assetId}, THREAT_ID = #{threatId}, VULNERABILITY_ID = #{VULNERABILITY_ID}, SAFEGUARD_ID = #{safeguardId}, RISKMODEL_ID = #{riskModelId} WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id FROM ASSTEMPLATE WHERE SESTOBJ_ID = '${value}'
SELECT * FROM ASSTEMPLATE WHERE METHODOLOGY LIKE '${value}'
SELECT t.* FROM ASSTEMPLATE AS t, ASSPROFILE_TEMPLATE AS at, ASSPROFILE AS p WHERE p.SESTOBJ_ID = '${value}' AND p.ID = at.PROFILE_ID AND at.TEMPLATE_ID = t.ID
